itunes:title: Q&A: how we first met, dating advice, balancing life w/ darian & britt
title: Q&A: how we first met, dating advice, balancing life w/ darian & britt
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
it's a week for dating advice, sleep tips, maintenance, favorite memories, breaking through mental barriers and so much more as darian & britt answer your most asked questions!


Join Britt's 6 Week CORE CHALLENGE

32:40 favorite memories together

44:10 how to hype one another up

52:00 communication
